module-option.name: principalsQuery
module-option.value: SELECT u.password FROM USER u JOIN ENTERPRISE e ON u.enterprise_id = e.id WHERE CONCAT(u.userName, '@', e.name) = ?

module-option.name: rolesQuery
module-option.value: SELECT distinct g.role, 'Roles' FROM ORG_GROUP g JOIN USER_GROUP ug ON g.id = ug.GROUP_id JOIN USER u ON u.id = ug.USER_id JOIN ENTERPRISE e ON e.id = u.enterprise_id WHERE CONCAT(u.userName, '@', e.name) = ?
